title: Odova chajda
content:
Odova chajda, is where you can find him, his pes and jeho "tajemství zahrady". It is located in the most southerly part of the Podhradí on the same road as hostinec. The garden is unkempt and definitely not a good place to wander around in the dark when one is opilost.

Úkoly
Lidé a nestvůry
Pokerové kostky: nováček
Tajemství zahrady
